item.title: Spotting Condemnation Posing as Conviction: Finale
item.description: This week, we examined the differences between conviction and condemnation. When trying to discern conviction from condemnation, try asking yourself these questions... Am I truly repenting of this sin? Or am I just trying to follow a rule? Is this thought designed to help me win? Or is telling me to give up? Is this making me want to try again after I've fallen? Or is it making me want to wallow in guilt and regret?
